text: Ani kahi granthadharaka asehi aheta ki tumhi tyanna khajin'yace visvasta banavala tarihi tumhala parata karatila ani tyancyapaiki kahi asehi aheta ki jara tumhi tyanna eka dinarahi theva mhanuna dyala tara joparyanta tumhi tyancya dokyavara ubhe na rahala toparyanta tumhala parata karanara nahita. He asasathi ki tyanni sanguna thevale ahe ki ya asiksitanca hakka maranyata amacyavara kahica gunha nahi. He loka januna ghetalyanantarahi allahacya sambandhane khote bolatata
